Holyhead, Isle of Anglesey, Wales, UK Feedback suggests that Trefor may have been 2nd instead of 3rd. Do you have more info?
Best trombone - Rhyl. Best cornet - Colwyn. Best euphonium - David Williams (Trefor). Best horn - Talfan Williams (Trefor).
